name: Flappy Pink Guy
description:
For more information on myself, please visit Kusaji.com

This is my first completed game using Unity3D and C#. 
Yes it's a Flappy Bird clone with some additional features, and yes I am quite proud of it.
The characters involved all belong to Filthy Frank, I did not invent Pink Guy nor any of the other unlockable characters in this game.
All music was created by myself.
